/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street that stretches out into the distance. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their presence subtly hinting at the cityscape beyond. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and urban life, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of the two in Beijing.
